trans-unit.source: Authorization Endpoint Errors
trans-unit.target: Authorization Endpoint Errors

trans-unit.source: Authorization Endpoint Errors
trans-unit.target: Authorization Endpoint Errors

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how to interpret and respond to errors that originate at the Azure AD authorization endpoint.
trans-unit.target: This topic explains how to interpret and respond to errors that originate at the Azure AD authorization endpoint.

trans-unit.source: Errors that occurs at the Azure authorization endpoint are returned in two different ways.
trans-unit.target: Errors that occurs at the Azure authorization endpoint are returned in two different ways.

trans-unit.source: When the error is displayed on a web page, it uses an HTTP 200 status code.
trans-unit.target: When the error is displayed on a web page, it uses an HTTP 200 status code.

trans-unit.source: When a client application is available to handle the error, the endpoint uses an HTTP 302 redirect status code.
trans-unit.target: When a client application is available to handle the error, the endpoint uses an HTTP 302 redirect status code.

trans-unit.source: Here is a sample HTTP 302 error response from the Azure AD authorization when an authorization code request is missing the required <parameterReference>response_type</parameterReference> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Here is a sample HTTP 302 error response from the Azure AD authorization when an authorization code request is missing the required <parameterReference>response_type</parameterReference> parameter.

trans-unit.source: Error Response Parameters
trans-unit.target: Error Response Parameters

trans-unit.source: Client-handled error responses includes the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: Client-handled error responses includes the following parameters.

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: error
trans-unit.target: error

trans-unit.source: An error code value defined in Section 5.2 of the <externalLink><linkText>OAuth 2.0 Authorization Framework</linkText><linkUri>http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: An error code value defined in Section 5.2 of the <externalLink><linkText>OAuth 2.0 Authorization Framework</linkText><linkUri>http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The next table describes the error codes that Azure AD returns.
trans-unit.target: The next table describes the error codes that Azure AD returns.

trans-unit.source: error_description
trans-unit.target: error_description

trans-unit.source: A more detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: A more detailed description of the error.

trans-unit.source: This message is not intended to be end-user friendly.
trans-unit.target: This message is not intended to be end-user friendly.

trans-unit.source: state
trans-unit.target: state

trans-unit.source: Returns the state value from the request, if the request includes a state value.
trans-unit.target: Returns the state value from the request, if the request includes a state value.

trans-unit.source: The state value is a randomly generated non-reused value that is sent in the request and returned in the response to prevent cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks.
trans-unit.target: The state value is a randomly generated non-reused value that is sent in the request and returned in the response to prevent cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="12a33bb0-247c-460b-bb55-f5d1e699b1e7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Best Practices for OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="12a33bb0-247c-460b-bb55-f5d1e699b1e7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Best Practices for OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD</link>.

trans-unit.source: Error Codes
trans-unit.target: Error Codes

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the error codes (<parameterReference>error</parameterReference> parameter values) that the Azure AD authorization endpoint returns.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the error codes (<parameterReference>error</parameterReference> parameter values) that the Azure AD authorization endpoint returns.

trans-unit.source: Error code
trans-unit.target: Error code

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Client Action
trans-unit.target: Client Action

trans-unit.source: invalid_request
trans-unit.target: invalid_request

trans-unit.source: Protocol error, such as a missing required parameter.
trans-unit.target: Protocol error, such as a missing required parameter.

trans-unit.source: Fix and resubmit the request.
trans-unit.target: Fix and resubmit the request.

trans-unit.source: For reference, use the protocol documentation and <link xlink:href="6c3e8f37-06ed-439e-bc2d-d6a318f32639" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authorization Code Grant Flow</link>.
trans-unit.target: For reference, use the protocol documentation and <link xlink:href="6c3e8f37-06ed-439e-bc2d-d6a318f32639" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authorization Code Grant Flow</link>.

trans-unit.source: This is a development error is typically caught during initial testing.
trans-unit.target: This is a development error is typically caught during initial testing.

trans-unit.source: unauthorized_client
trans-unit.target: unauthorized_client

trans-unit.source: The client application is not permitted to request an authorization code.
trans-unit.target: The client application is not permitted to request an authorization code.

trans-unit.source: This usually occurs when the client application is not registered in Azure AD or is not added to the user's Azure AD tenant.
trans-unit.target: This usually occurs when the client application is not registered in Azure AD or is not added to the user's Azure AD tenant.

trans-unit.source: The application can prompt the user with instruction for installing the application and adding it to Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: The application can prompt the user with instruction for installing the application and adding it to Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Application Access</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=286007%%amp;amp;clcid=0x409</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Application Access</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=286007%%amp;amp;clcid=0x409</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: access_denied
trans-unit.target: access_denied

trans-unit.source: Resource owner denied consent
trans-unit.target: Resource owner denied consent

trans-unit.source: The client application can notify the user that it cannot proceed unless the user consents.
trans-unit.target: The client application can notify the user that it cannot proceed unless the user consents.

trans-unit.source: unsupported_response_type
trans-unit.target: unsupported_response_type

trans-unit.source: The authorization server does not support the response type in the request.
trans-unit.target: The authorization server does not support the response type in the request.

trans-unit.source: Fix and resubmit the request.
trans-unit.target: Fix and resubmit the request.

trans-unit.source: For reference, use the protocol documentation and <link xlink:href="6c3e8f37-06ed-439e-bc2d-d6a318f32639" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authorization Code Grant Flow</link>.
trans-unit.target: For reference, use the protocol documentation and <link xlink:href="6c3e8f37-06ed-439e-bc2d-d6a318f32639" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authorization Code Grant Flow</link>.

trans-unit.source: This is a development error is typically caught during initial testing.
trans-unit.target: This is a development error is typically caught during initial testing.

trans-unit.source: server_error
trans-unit.target: server_error

trans-unit.source: The server encountered an unexpected error.
trans-unit.target: The server encountered an unexpected error.

trans-unit.source: Retry the request.
trans-unit.target: Retry the request.

trans-unit.source: These errors can result from temporary conditions.
trans-unit.target: These errors can result from temporary conditions.

trans-unit.source: The client application might explain to the user that its response is delayed due a temporary error.
trans-unit.target: The client application might explain to the user that its response is delayed due a temporary error.

trans-unit.source: temporarily_unavailable
trans-unit.target: temporarily_unavailable

trans-unit.source: The server is temporarily too busy to handle the request.
trans-unit.target: The server is temporarily too busy to handle the request.

trans-unit.source: Retry the request.
trans-unit.target: Retry the request.

trans-unit.source: The client application might explain to the user that its response is delayed due a temporary condition.
trans-unit.target: The client application might explain to the user that its response is delayed due a temporary condition.

trans-unit.source: invalid_resource
trans-unit.target: invalid_resource

trans-unit.source: The target resource is invalid because it does not exist, Azure AD cannot find it, or it is not correctly configured.
trans-unit.target: The target resource is invalid because it does not exist, Azure AD cannot find it, or it is not correctly configured.

trans-unit.source: This indicates the resource has not been configured in the tenant.
trans-unit.target: This indicates the resource has not been configured in the tenant.

trans-unit.source: The application can prompt the user with instruction for installing the application and adding it to Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: The application can prompt the user with instruction for installing the application and adding it to Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Application Access</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=286007%%amp;amp;clcid=0x409</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Application Access</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=286007%%amp;amp;clcid=0x409</linkUri></externalLink>.
